title: Alex Kuhn
text:
I am a third-year PhD student in the School of Statistics at the University of Minnesota. I am advised by Sara Algeri and Galin Jones. I am a part of the Data Science in Multi-Messenger Astrophysics (DSMMA) program.
I spend a lot of time developing statistical procedures to solve challenging problems in astrophysics and high-energy physics. A copy of my CV is here.
